text: The Beggar Prince is a lostThe Library of Congress American Silent Feature Film Survival Catalog:The Beggar PrinceThe Beggar Prince at silentera.com 1920 film directed by William Worthington and produced by Sessue Hayakawa's Haworth Pictures Corporation.The AFI Catalog of Feature Films:The Beggar Prince still from the production. ==Cast== *Sessue Hayakawa as Nikki/Prince *Beatrice La Plante as Olala *Thelma Percy as Sosad *Bert Hadley as Grand Vizier *Robert Bolder as Bunko *Josef Swickard as Nodo *Charles A. Post as Court Murderer (*as Buddy Post) ==References== ==External links== * * *lobby poster Category:1920 films Category:American films Category:Haworth Pictures Corporation films Category:Films directed by William Worthington Category:American black-and-white films Category:American silent feature films Category:Lost American films Category:1920 comedy films Category:American comedy films Category:Film Booking Offices of America films Category:1920 lost films Category:Lost comedy films
title: The Beggar Prince
